title: Telegram Premium makes an appearance on latest iOS beta, offers exclusive stickers and reactions
content:
Telegram is one of the most feature-packed instant messaging apps out there. Since its inception, Telegramâ€™s funding has largely come out of the pocket of Pavel Durov, the founder of the service. The post Telegram Premium makes an appearance on latest iOS beta, offers exclusive stickers and reactions appeared first on XDA.
description: Telegram has introduced a new subscription plan called Telegram Premium. It's currently only available on iOS. Read on.
